text: The 2019 season was Bodø/Glimt's second season back in the Eliteserien since their relegation at the end of the 2016 season. Bodø/Glimt finished the season in second position, qualifying for the first qualifying round of the UEFA Europa League. In the Norwegian Cup, they were knocked out by Strømmen in the second round. ==Squad== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:90%; width:100%;" |- ! style="background:#FFDD00; color:black;
